info.title: Provision
info.description: A module for managing provisioning and activation.

methods.name: push
methods.summary: Used by a distributor to push provision info to firebolt.

params.name: distributorId
params.summary: The id of the distributor that this device was provisioned for. (Sometimes called partnerId).

params.name: accountId
params.summary: The id of the account that is device is attached to in the back office.

params.name: deviceId
params.summary: The id of the device in the back office.
